General.Name: XS Financial Inc
General.Description: XS Financial Inc., a specialty finance company, provides equipment leasing solutions in the United States. The company offers equipment-specific leasing, sale-leasebacks, and purchasing solutions, as well as equipment procurement services. It serves owner/operators of cannabis and hemp companies, including cultivators, oil processors, manufacturers, and testing laboratories. The company was formerly known as Xtraction Services Holdings Corp. and changed its name to XS Financial Inc. in June 2020. XS Financial Inc. was founded in 2017 and is based in Los Angeles, California.
General.Address: 1901 Avenue of the Stars, Los Angeles, CA, United States, 90067
